statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -10 \\ 0 \\ 20 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 6 \\ -6 \\ -18 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
